channel.title: How do i add skill requirements to an item?
channel.description: Title ^ Self explains. I need to know how to add a requirement to my 3rd age vambraces. Its on the rest of the 3rd age, except those...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2009, 04:41:59 am[/size][hr]Come on people! It's a simple question :( I need some help.

item.title: How do i add skill requirements to an item?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

wear() method:

if(wearID == 14505) return !playerLevel[playerRanged] >= requirement ? false : true;

Replace ‘requirement’ with the level you’d like your requirement to be.

Read full topic
